function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty carrying out face-to-face surveys during peak breakout of COVID-19 and subsequent epidemic prevention periods","Impact":"Limited sample size and data collection, affecting the accuracy of research findings","Mitigation":"Use alternative data collection methods or wait for a safer time to conduct face-to-face surveys","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, remote interview tools","People":"Researchers, survey participants, community members","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions, community organizations"},{"Description":"Strict epidemic prevention and control measures limiting the scope of surveys","Impact":"Inability to conduct large-scale surveys, reducing the representativeness of data","Mitigation":"Collaborate with local authorities to find safe and effective ways to conduct surveys within the given restrictions","Technologies":"Remote survey tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, local authorities, community members","Owner":"Research institutions, local authorities, community organizations"}]}
